netapp_network_configuration_description: The Enterprise File Storage service is a managed storage service exposed via an IP address on the vRack. Once you have selected or created a vRack, activated “vRack Services”, and created a subnet, you can assign your storage system’s IP.
netapp_network_configuration_no_vrack_fi: You do not have a vRack
netapp_network_configuration_create_vrac: Would you like to create a new vRack?
netapp_network_configuration_no_vrack_se: You do not have any vRack Services attached to the {{ vrack }} vRack
netapp_network_configuration_create_vrac: Do you want to enable vRack Services?
netapp_network_configuration_no_subnet_f: You do not have any subnets attached to vRack Services
netapp_network_configuration_no_subnet_t: Would you like to create a new subnet?
netapp_network_configuration_vrack_assoc: A problem occurred attaching your vRack to vRack services:
